product_name: Osprey Talon 22 Pack - Iris Purple - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to accommodate a multitude of outdoor activities, the Osprey Talon 22 Pack in Iris Purple holds just what you need to move fast and light. Lightweight Osprey AirScape back panel features ridge molded foam with air channels covered in airy mesh. Mesh-lined, perforated shoulder straps and hipbelt save weight and enhance breathability. Panel-loading main compartment holds lunch, an extra layer of clothes and tools. Osprey Talon 22 pack accommodates a variety of back lengths with an adjustable torso: just rip it, adjust it and stick it. Front stretch pocket is ideal for stashing a jacket or guidebook. Zippered stretch mesh pockets on hipbelt; twin stretch pockets on shoulder straps. Hydration compartment is accessible from outside so you can slip reservoir in after your pack is full (reservoir sold separately). Closeout.
short_description: Designed to accommodate a multitude of outdoor activities, the Osprey Talon 22 Pack in Iris Purple holds just what you need to move fast and light.
